name: Amanda Barbara Finkbeiner
part_bio: Daughter of Barbara (Haist) and Matthew Finkbeiner
bio:
FINKBEINER in memory of Bertha
died June 8, 1911
ae 21 yrs 4 wks.
Melissa
died Aug. 4, 1912
ae 24 yrs. 4 mos. 15 ds.
Henry Emerson
died Apr. 15, 1913
ae 15 yrs. 11 mos. 15 ds.
Amanda Barbara
died June 13, 1914
ae 28 yrs. 7 mos. 18 ds.
children of Matthew and Catherine Finkbeiner
in memory of Matthew Finkbeiner
died Jan. 24, 1916
ae 69 yrs. 3 mos. 12 ds.
Catherine his wife
died Oct. 11, 1921
ae 70 yrs 5 mos. 27 ds.
Charles William
died Dec. 31, 1918
ae 26 yrs. 5 mos. 3 ds.
